column4: Hello, is there any X.org native tool for recording desktop sessions or specific window or specific region ? something like recordmydesktop or xvidcap but more native to X.org server that achieve better performance and stability? as I'm facing serious stability and performance issue with mentioned tools ..  recommendation of another tool would be welcomed too ..
as far is i know recordmydesktop works fine, usually
maybe you just have to decrease resolution for better performance
sometimes after recording long session I find that it recorded nothing ... this happens with both xvidcap and recordmydesktop
